parameters.name: Accept-Language

schema.description: Sets language code. Supported languages are english (en) and polish (pl)

parameters.description: Sets language code. Supported languages are english (en) and polish (pl)

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: Page size. Default value is 20, max allowed page size is 100.

parameters.description: Page size. Default value is 20, max allowed page size is 100.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort distributions inside datasets by following fields in ascending or descending direction.

FieldExamples
id/catalog?sort=id
/catalog?sort=-id
title/catalog?sort=title
/catalog?sort=-title
modified/catalog?sort=modified
/catalog?sort=-modified
created/catalog?sort=created
/catalog?sort=-created
